body.name: CAMEL CROWN Women's Ski Jacket Thicken Winter Snow Coat Warm Fleece Mountain Waterproof Female Jacket Hooded Windbreaker
features: ✔FEATURE --- Women winter coats are made of high-density fabric and durable water-repellent coating. The texture is flexible and wear-resistant, which can effectively resist the invasion of cold winds, lock the body temperature, and have no fear of outdoor cold winds. keep you warm and dry.The lining is plush and soft, and offers superior insulation against the elements.

✔ WINDPROOF AND WARMTH --- The windbreaker jacket has the double placket and the stand-up collar windproof hood form a dense windproof structure, which resists the external cold wind and keep the inner warmth of the body. Plush lining is comfortable and skin-friendly. Double thermal blessing, repel the cold wave and travel easily.

✔ ANTI-SCRATCH&WEAR RESISTANT --- The womens ski coats shell is made of polymer blend material, strong textile fiber fabric shell, which can reduce the risk of accidental injury, avoids being scratched by rocks and branches, and at the same time protects your body. accidental injury avoids being scratched by rocks and branches and at the same time protects your body.

✔ERGONOMICS --- The winter outdoor coats use ergonomics draping technique is consistent with body movement.3D three-dimensional cut body, comfortable fit, free movement, neat and stylish. With simple tones, it is fashionable and can be worn on many occasions.No matter you do various outdoor activities or some intense training sessions, you can still feel pretty comfortable at any time.

✔ MULTI POCKETS --- The women's insulated jacket has multiple pockets inside and outside to meet your daily storage needs, easy to hold ski goggles, valuables and other accessories. The outside pockets are all waterproof zippers to prevent your personal belongings from getting wet, so it is suitable for a variety of scenarios, such as ski, snowboarding, camping, resort,backcountry,traveling, hiking, and many other winter outdoor sports.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is such a beautiful color and is so warm! I needed a new jacket to keep me warm this winter and this one fits perfect. I love the color and all the zip pockets. I did size up one size based on other reviews and the fit is great. Considering I will be wearing layers underneath, it's fine for it to be slightly big. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm & Water Proof
reviews.reviewText: Wore this in slushy snow and rainy cold days here in Washington state, it fits well and is fairly warm. I love how I can just brush off the water. I haven't tested it below 32 Deg F yet, but it's great quality for the price and I'll get plenty of wear out of it this winter. As far as fit, I'm plus size and ordered the 2x. It is not fitted, rather more boxy but comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is AMAZING! It is a steal! I live in Upstate NY, and this jacket has been keeping me nice and toasty. There’s a small zippered interior pocket and two outside zippered pockets. The outside pockets are deep, so they can easily hold my keys, phone, gloves, and hat. I haven’t needed to wear a hat because the hood is SO WARM! It’s so soft, and I love that it has its own buttons to keep my nose and below warm. It’s also detachable. The cuffs are velco adjustable so I can make them tighter to stop wind and precipitation from coming in. Th bottom has a drawstring to also keep the wind out. The color is gorgeous. I’m 5’2 and weigh 160lbs. I ordered a large and it fits perfectly! I can wear heavy shirts underneath and have plenty of movement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warm, lightweight and stylish
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure what to expect with this jacket but I ordered it because the price was right and I really needed a warmer coat. It is amazingly warm and comfortable. The pockets are roomy enough to accommodate my dog's longline leash when we go out in the woods and a treat bag in the other pocket. Plus it has a left inside zipper pocket easy to access for a phone or wallet. I ordered the purple and it is a darkish purple so it doesn't stand out too much which I like. Seems like a wine color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Jacket
reviews.reviewText: Runs small. I normally wear a 2x, but brought a larger size 3x, I probably could have used a 4x, due to my belly, but I will make it work. It seems very good quality. Sleeves are a little long, but I prefer my jacket and coats oversized. It’s water wicking, and warm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coat for winter weather
reviews.reviewText: I live in northern NH and was skeptical about the price being so low. This coat is amazing! So warm,water resistant and fits great (I did size up bc of previous reviews but dont think I needed to).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tad snug for a 3X.
reviews.reviewText: Ordered 3X to allow for sweater underneath. Will be too snug with a sweater underneath, but without the sweater I can move freely and doesn't bind when driving. Pretty blue coat with soft faux fur inside. Well made; seams and zippers are sturdy. Happy with the purchase.(I've been losing weight, so it will be perfect in a week or two) The measurements posted in the size guide aren't accurate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm jacket at a great price
reviews.reviewText: I’m from Florida so ordered it for a Tennessee mountain trip with temps expected 2-40 degrees (f). I had no problem playing in 17-degree snow with just a tshirt under it. You can move around easily as well and it protects against wind. I’m 5’1 wear size 18/20 and I got a 3x so there would be room for multiple layers (and there was, I just didn’t need too many with it). If you’ve got bigger boobs (mine are 42F) then it’s gonna be a little tight but still doable.

Una amiga la compró y comenta que es super calientita, cubre muy bien, perfecta para frío intenso. Aún no sabe si realmente es impermeable, lo que sí es que viene muy amplia, ella pesa 65 kg y mide 1.60 m. Normalmente usa talla M y no le gustó que le quedara muy grande, creo que la talla CH hubiera quedado perfecta y aún le permitiría usar otro suéter abajo.
Fits me perfectly I'm 5'4" 225 lbs....Great quality....fit true to size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Ski coat . looks good but not suitable
reviews.reviewText: This was over stuffed and so too close fitting to fit in the layers required for skiing in european conditions.Not supplied on Amazon Prime, slow to arrive and WARING RETURNS are via UPS . No UPS drop off in our town.The Post off door step collection is so good now. this is a huge deterrent from shopping from this supplier in the future.

me.encanto el.material, están súper calientitas, la verdad la encontré en muy buen precio y me encantó, lo único es que viene grande, por lo regular yo soy grande, pero está si me quedo bastante holgada, yo me iría por una chica tal vez por si la.quieres muy justa.

The media could not be loaded. Tela de muy buena calidad, si es impermeable, muy abrigadora, excelentes acabados, forrada por dentro al frente y atrás, las mangas no traen forro afelpado pero no son frías, es amplia, mido 1.70, peso 90kg, pedí XXL y me quedo grande, no la cambié porque no me agradan las chamarras tan ajustadas, pero seguramente 2 tallas menos si me hubiera cerrado sin problema
